personal_profile.name: Alex Morgan
personal_profile.title: Full-Stack Developer & Product Designer
personal_profile.elevator_pitch: Detail-oriented full-stack developer with a product-design background, bridging visual intent and technical execution.

career_objective: A thoughtful builder who connects product thinking with robust engineering.
core_competencies: Full-stack web development (React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript)

career_story.origin: Started in software engineering and discovered a love for design.

key_transitions.reason: To deliver end-to-end experiences without losing design intent.
key_transitions.outcome: A hybrid skill set that blends visual craft with engineering rigor.

career_story.current_focus: Modern web frameworks and practical AI integration.
career_story.future_goals: Grow into a lead role that guides product direction and technical architecture.

working_style.collaboration_approach: Clear communication, early feedback, and shared understanding.
working_style.problem_solving_process: Start with user needs, validate assumptions, then engineer for scalability.
working_style.ideal_work_environment: Collaborative teams that value quality and user experience.

fun_facts: Enjoys turning complex requirements into clear product flows.
Keeps a personal checklist for pixel-level QA.
